LB_LOGGING_LEVEL.description: The log level to use. See Source/Logger.js for levels.

LB_SPREADSHEET_FILE_ID.description: The ID of the Google Sheet spreadsheet containing user info.

LB_DOMAIN.description: The domain to restrict emails to.

LB_PREFIX.description: The prefix to expect for commands.

LB_TOKEN.description: The bot token used to connect to the Discord API.

LB_REPORT_CHANNEL.description: The snowflake ID of the channel to report to. The guild is derived from this.

LB_WELCOME_CHANNEL.description: The snowflake ID of the channel to point new users to.

LB_ADMIN_ROLE.description: The snowflake ID of the admin role.

LB_MOD_ROLE.description: The snowflake ID of the moderator role.

LB_VERIFY_ROLE.description: The snowflake ID of the verification role.

LB_ALUM_ROLE.description: The snowflake ID of the alumni role.
